I don't know why people get so worked up over this stuff.  I like vanilla, I like NTR, I like loli, and plenty of other fetishes.  About the only things I really don't like are scat and guro but you don't see me spamming those comment sections with wishes for their fans to die.  Occasionally I do ask "why?" or comment that I'd have preferred not have had a bit of those in an otherwise my taste hentai but seriously, why the hate?  Normies would think we are all a bunch of sick perverts so why can't we be united in our perversity?  (Yeah, I know, I'm taking the trolls way too seriously, this is the Internet, blah blah. Just wondering why we can't have mutual tolerance when we're all fellow pervs).
